item.description:
Pot Luck Supper: Pre-Summer Theme

With the days getting longer and the weather progressively getting warmer Summer is well on the way! 

 

Please choose one of the following to bring:

3 Women Bring some meat, chicken, etc. for grilling!

2 Women Choose Salad: Tossed, Potato, Macaroni, etc.

3 Women Choose Sides: Potatoes, Rice, Veggies.

2 Women Choose a Dessert.

 

NOTE:  WHEN YOU RESERVE PLEASE ADD A NOTE AS TO WHAT TYPE OF COURSE YOU ARE BRINGING AND WHAT IT IS SO IT WON'T BE REPEATED. IF ALL THE MAIN COURSES ARE TAKEN, DO NOT PICK THIS, GO TO ANOTHER CATEGORY. THE SAME GOES FOR SALADS, SIDES AND DESSERTS.

 

BYOB! or Please bring what you would like to drink ..

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck Supper Pre-Summer Theme
